statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT username, password FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, LENGTH(username) AS username_length FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 'd4111e83-044b-4b23-b7a5-4d6e83fd1ec6'
SELECT username, password FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'joh%'
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE password = 'P@ssw0rd'
SELECT user_id FROM user_profiles WHERE iris_scan_data IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT username, password FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_profiles JOIN access_permissions ON user_profiles.user_id = access_permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT user_id, username, permission_type FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN access_permissions ON user_profiles.user_id = access_permissions.user_id WHERE permission_type = 'admin';

SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles WHERE password = 'securePassword';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, username, iris_scan_data FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM access_permissions JOIN user_profiles ON access_permissions.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE permission_type = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, access_permission FROM UserProfiles WHERE access_permission = 'ADMIN';
SELECT user_id, username, access_permission, iris_scan FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM Permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM UserProfiles WHERE access_permission = 'Admin' AND user_id = 1234;
SELECT user_id, access_permission, iris_scan FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM AccessLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT p.permission_id, p.permission_name, u.username FROM Permissions p JOIN UserProfiles u ON p.permission_name = u.access_permission;

SELECT username, iris_scan_data FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM access_permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT user_id, username FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM access_permissions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM user_profiles u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.user_id;
